docs.text:
Senior undergraduate student at 
UNIST
, majoring in CSE(Computer Science & Engineering).

Currently, I am working as an undergraduate intern in 
iVADER lab
.

If you are interested, please e-mail me. (
seiker@unist.ac.kr
)




Available Languages




English
 : Business-level conversation available




TOEIC
 score: 920/990 (Valid until Jan. 08, 2019)


TEPS
 score: 714/990 (Valid until Dec. 03, 2019)









Experiences




Internship
 at 
NECSST Lab.
, UNIST.




Period: Sep. 2016 - Aug. 2017


Studied briefly about Linux kernel, distributed computer & storage systems, and flash memory & FTL(Flash Translation Layer).




Internship
 at 
iVADER Lab.
, UNIST.




Period: Jan. 2018 - Now


Participated in a project which helps novice programmers to design mobile applications. (Paper submitted to CHI 2019)




Domestic Exchange Student
 to 
SNU
, South Korea.




Period: 2016 Summer semester (Jun. 2016 - Aug. 2016), 2016 Winter semester (Dec. 2016 - Feb. 2017)




International Exchange Student
 to 
HKUST
, Hong Kong.




Period: 2018 Summer semester (Jun. 2018 - Aug. 2018)






Awards




Excellence award
 in 
2017 Korea Supercomputing Challenge




Awarded by the president of KSCSE(Korean Society for Computational Science and Engineering).




Semester academic excellence award
 for 2017 Spring semester




Semester GPA 3.92 / 4.30




Semester academic excellence award
 for 2018 Spring semester




Semester GPA 4.10 / 4.30




Academic performance scholarship
 since Mar. 2015 - Now
